segments.text: What do you mean his grandmothers are already dead ? Wait a minute , you don't think he's avoiding me , do you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well you know , claiming that your grandmother is sick is the classic excuse used to get out of doing something .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh man , I hate rejection . It really makes you feel terrible , especially when you really liked the person .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything I can do to help ? Just remember that I'm there for you if you want to talk about it .
segments.speaker: S2
